SQL.LOAD: SELECT equipment_id, equipment_list_id, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, equipment_list_detail_id FROM elp_equipment_list_detail WHERE equipment_list_detail_id = :equipment_list_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT equipment_id, equipment_list_id, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, equipment_list_detail_id FROM elp_equipment_list_detail WHERE equipment_list_id = :equipment_list_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_equipment_list_detail SET equipment_id = :equipment_id, equipment_list_id = :equipment_list_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration WHERE equipment_list_detail_id = :equipment_list_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_equipment_list_detail ( equipment_id, equipment_list_id, effective, expiration, equipment_list_detail_id ) VALUES ( :equipment_id, :equipment_list_id, :effective, :expiration, :equipment_list_detail_id )
SQL.DELETE: UPDATE ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST_DETAIL SET EXPIRATION = SYSDATE WHERE EQUIPMENT_LIST_DETAIL_ID = :EQUIPMENT_LIST_DETAIL_ID
SQL.IS_CHILD: SELECT equipment_list_detail_id FROM elp_equipment_list_detail WHERE equipment_id = :equipment_id AND equipment_list_id = :equipment_list_id
SQL.EQUIPMENT_EXPIRATION: SELECT EXPIRATION FROM ELP_EQUIPMENT WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = :EQUIPMENT_ID
SQL.EQUIPMENT_EFFECTIVE: SELECT EFFECTIVE FROM ELP_EQUIPMENT WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = :EQUIPMENT_ID
SQL.EQUIPMENT_LIST: select equipment_id from elp_equipment_list_detail where equipment_list_id=:equipment_list_id and expiration > sysdate
